results.description: Paris St-Germain slump to a third Ligue 1 defeat of the season as bottom side Dijon come from behind to stun the French champions.
results.shortTitle: Bottom side Dijon stun leaders PSG
results.title: Dijon 2-1 Paris Saint Germain: French champions slump to shock defeat against bottom side

results.description: Senegal goalkeeper Alfred Gomis leaves Italy's SPAL for to join French side Djion.
results.shortTitle: Senegal goalkeeper Gomis joins French club Djion
results.title: Senegal goalkeeper Alfred Gomis leaves Italy for Djion

results.description: Cardiff City defender Bruno Manga joins Dijon for £3m with Middlesbrough's Aden Flint replacing him.
results.shortTitle: Cardiff City sell Manga to French club Dijon
results.title: Bruno Manga: Cardiff City sell defender to French club Dijon

results.description: Amiens' Ligue 1 game at Dijon is halted for five minutes at the request of visiting defender Prince Gouano after he was allegedly racially abused.
results.shortTitle: Ligue 1 game halted over alleged abuse
results.title: Dijon 0-0 Amiens: Ligue 1 game halted after alleged racial abuse

results.description: Paris St-Germain boss Thomas Tuchel praises his side's "good reaction" as they beat Dijon in their first game since exiting the Champions League.
results.title: Dijon 0-4 Paris St-Germain: Ligue 1 leaders win first game since Champions League exit

results.description: Angel di Maria scores twice and Thomas Meunier adds a third as Paris St-Germain beat Dijon to advance into the Coupe de France semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Di Maria double sees PSG progress
results.title: Paris St-Germain 3-0 Dijon: Di Maria double sees PSG advance

results.description: Monaco are beaten by fellow Ligue 1 strugglers Dijon in their first game since sacking boss Thierry Henry.
results.title: Dijon 2-0 Monaco: Strugglers beaten after Henry sacking

results.description: Thierry Henry is still waiting for a first win as a manager as his Monaco rescue a late draw against Dijon.
results.shortTitle: Henry waits for first win as Monaco held
results.title: Monaco 2-2 Dijon: Thierry Henry still waiting for first win

results.description: Mario Balotelli is booked for complaining to the referee about alleged racist chants as his Nice side lose 3-2 to Dijon.
results.title: Dijon 3-2 Nice

results.description: Neymar scores four goals and Edinson Cavani becomes Paris St-Germain's all-time joint top scorer as the Ligue 1 leaders hammer Dijon.
results.title: Paris Saint Germain 8-0 Dijon

thumbnail.altText: Edinson Cavani and Neymar celebrate a goal for Paris St-Germain

results.description: Thomas Meunier scores twice, including an injury-time winner, as Ligue 1 leaders Paris St-Germain win at Dijon.
results.title: Dijon 1-2 Paris St-Germain

results.description: Radamel Falcao scores a hat-trick as Monaco, who left Kylian Mbappe on the bench, thrash Dijon 4-1 in Ligue 1.
results.title: Dijon 1-4 Monaco

results.description: Real Madrid and Barcelona battle for the title on the final day of La Liga on Sunday, while Juventus can be crowned champions of Italy.
results.shortTitle: Five-year wait over for Real Madrid?
results.title: Real Madrid on brink of La Liga title while Juventus can clinch Serie A

thumbnail.altText: Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane (left) and Barcelona boss Luis Enrique

results.description: Radamel Falcao's late free-kick against Dijon puts Ligue 1 leaders Monaco three points above champions Paris St-Germain.
results.title: Monaco 2-1 Dijon

results.description: Mario Balotelli scores twice to send Nice four points clear at the top of Ligue 1 - as they beat Dijon and Monaco lose to Lyon.
results.title: Nice 2-1 Dijon

results.description: Paris St-Germain move to top of Ligue 1 with a convincing win over newly promoted Dijon at the Parc des Princes.
results.title: Paris Saint Germain 3-0 Dijon
